name: Hentai World
detailed_description:
Hentai World will test power of your logical thinking and desire to see hentai art.
You need to rely on your mind, use it to complete the image of its mixed parts, preferably by making them as quickly as possible and get into the high score table. All puzzle parts are randomly generated.


Features:

  • Beautiful artwork
  • 12 Unique Levels
  • Relaxing and romantic music
  • Gallery Mode
  • Achievements
  • Table of records

Free Updates:

We will release series of free updates within 3 months after release. |

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content
